segments.text: Observing this kitchen, I see the sink area first.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Faucet running, basin full, water spilling over steadily.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Woman faces left, drying plate with towel, expression blank.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Puddle forms at her feet, one shoe wet.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Window above shows garden, bushes, fence in background.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: To the left, cabinet doors open with cookie jar inside.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Boy on two-step stool, tilted, reaching into jar.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He holds plate in other hand, body stretched.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Girl nearby, arm raised, palm toward jar.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Counter clear below, stool legs splayed unstably.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Dishes stacked right of woman, towel bunched.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Curtains tied back on window panes.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's surprising how all these elements coexist without notice.
segments.speaker: PAR
